BookingStatus.description: Possible values: pending_Verification, verified, cancelled, rental_Created.

BookingVerificationStatus.description: Possible values: pending, approved, rejected_Mismatch, rejected_Other.

ContractStatus.description: Possible values: issued, partially_Signed, signed, voided, expired.

EsignProvider.description: Possible values: native, docusign, adobesign, signnow, other.

FeeType.description: Possible values: deposit, rental_Charge, surcharge, damage, other.

KycType.description: Possible values: national_ID, driver_License, passport, other.

PaymentMethod.description: Possible values: unknown, cash, card, ewallet, bank_Transfer, vnPay_QR, international_Card.

RentalStatus.description: Possible values: reserved, in_Progress, completed, late, cancelled.

SignatureType.description: Possible values: drawn, typed, digital_Cert, onPaper.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Bearer {token}"
